1.title: Community Beautification
1.intro: We are doing a roadside cleanup on Tuckaseegee Road between Mulberry Church Road and Queen City Drive as part of our continued community outreach efforts.##p##With over 700 lbs of food donated so far to Second Harvest, as well as other community contributions, Nova Social members are increasingly having a positive impact on our local community.##p##We have supplies for up to 10 members.##p##We've estimated collecting between 30 and 50 full bags of trash from the roadside and around the Tuckaseegee Park area.
1.summary: Huge success! Thank you all that came out and donated your time to our Community Cleanup. We removed 50 bags of trash from the roadside and sidewalk areas. Great Job!
